title: What is the truth?
description: Iâ€™ve been eating from this restaurant for more than 10 years. Thereâ€™s been a long history of 2 rivals with the same name of this restaurant but with different address. Regardless of who is the first to start selling this, thereâ€™s great efforts from the rival of this shop to constantly trying leave a bad name to this shop. This shopâ€™s food is always fresh and tasty, i just ordered an hour ago and itâ€™s as fresh as eating at the shop (provided that you eat immediately). I saw many bad reviews and I questioned their authenticity as many of the reviews never talk about how they complained to the shop, what was the response of the shop, was there a refund, etc. Just plain complaining about bad food from here. So you can tell these are people trying to create bad reviews for the sake of smearing bad name to this shop. Im from Singapore, just come to***to travel once in a while.
